name: Fractions for Kids
description: Fraction for Kids provides a fun and interactive way for kids to learn about fractions.  Features of the app:  1) Naming Fractions - Wholes,Halves,Thirds...  2) Fraction Numbers (Examples with pictures)  3) Identify Fraction  4) Compare Fraction  5) Shade Shapes for the given fraction  6) Missing Fractions  7) Number Line ( Learn & Practice)  8) Writing Fractions  9) Fraction Addition (Learn & Practice)
